Internal Datasets

Example map (random cluster neutral landscape model).

Patch Level Metrics

Area (patch level)

Core area index (patch level)

Related Circumscribing Circle (CIRCLE)

Core area (patch level)

lsm_p_enn()

Euclidean Nearest-Neighbor Distance (ENN)

lsm_p_frac()

Fractal dimension index (patch level)

lsm_p_gyrate()

Radius of Gyration (patch level)

lsm_p_ncore()

Number of core areas (patch level)

lsm_p_para()

Perimeter-area ratio (patch level)

lsm_p_perim()

Perimeter (patch level)

lsm_p_shape()

Shape index (patch level)
